tool_description: Creates visual soil profile representations from borehole data, showing soil layers, test results, and engineering properties with depth.

sample_ids.description: Sample IDs from the borehole in depth order

depth_intervals.description: Depth intervals for each sample in meters

profile_parameters.description: Soil parameters to display in the profile

error_messages: Invalid borehole ID: Borehole identifier not found in project data.
Mismatched arrays: sample_ids and depth_intervals must have the same length.
Invalid depth data: Depth intervals must be positive and in ascending order.
Unknown parameters: One or more profile_parameters are not available for the samples.
Invalid groundwater level: Must be a positive number within the borehole depth range.
usage: Specify borehole_id, sample_ids, depth_intervals, and profile_parameters to generate a soil profile. Optionally include groundwater_level for complete visualization.

profile_data.description: Formatted soil profile data for visualization

layer_boundaries.description: Identified soil layer boundary depths in meters

dominant_soil_types.description: Dominant soil classification for each identified layer

profile_summary.description: Summary description of the soil profile
